{{Infobox Song |歌曲名= |image= |圖片信息= |圖片大小= 250px |演唱= Jeff Williams
Casey Lee Williams
Sandy Casey |作曲= Jeff Williams |填詞= Jeff Williams |編曲= Jeff Williams |MV編導= |收錄專輯= }} '''I'm The One'''是美国'''{{ruby|Rooster Teeth Productions|公鸡牙齿动画工作室}}RWBY团队'''制作的动画'''《[[RWBY]]》'''中的一首插入歌。这首歌在Vol.3第四章出现。 == 简介 == 《I'm The One》是[[Mercury Black]]的角色歌。 这首歌类似于[[Yang Xiao Long]]的角色歌[[I Burn]]，体现出一种极端的自信和狂妄，但不同于后者的是，相比后者，这首歌情绪比较负面，且充满了血腥和暴戾的气息。把这两首歌放在一起比对是一件很有趣的事。听众老爷们不妨试试。此处提供试听： File:Jeff Williams - I'm the One.mp3 == 歌词 == {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:|rstyle=color:|reserveWidth=200px |original= '''''Sandy Casey''''':Welcome to the bloodbath jump into the tub '''''Casey Lee Williams''''':Fist-fight, death-match come and join the club '''''Sandy Casey''''':Kick-start your face with a metal-clad boot '''''Casey Lee Williams''''':You should give up now your retaliation's moot '''''Sandy Casey''''':I'll run circles round ya, I can touch the sky '''''Casey Lee Williams''''':I'm gonna make ya hurt and I'm gonna make you cry You want to mess around? Well come on let's go '''''Sandy Casey''''':I got no time to waste let's start the show '''''Sandy & Casey Lee''''':I'm the one that your mama said 'Don't mess with them or you'll end up dead That type they don't follow any rules' You're looking tall, you're looking tough I'm sorry dude, it's not enough Your girlfriend's purse won't help you win this duel '''''Jeff Williams''''':The bigger they are then the more that they bleed The deeper the scars that won't heal '''''Sandy & Jeff''''':Buckets of pain as they lie there in shame Knowing how true defeat feels '''''Sandy & Casey Lee''''':I'm the one '''''Sandy Casey''''':That was born in a nightmare a murderer's son '''''Sandy & Casey Lee''''':Got no gun '''''Sandy Casey''''':But I gleam like a blade and I'm harder than iron '''''Sandy & Casey Lee''''':I'm the one '''''Casey Lee Williams''''':Who rose out of filth and was loved by no-one '''''Sandy & Casey Lee''''':Delusion '''''Casey Lee Williams''''':I'll steal til your blind and defeat you from inside your mind '''''Sandy Casey''''':You're still standing up? Well let's go another round '''''Casey Lee Williams''''':Singin' king of pain and you're gonna get crowned You like the way I dress? Yeah I know I'm fine '''''Sandy Casey''''':The blood's gonna stain but it won't be mine Just chill here while I drop into the brush '''''Casey Lee Williams''''':See you when I land and you're gonna feel the crush Lay right down and grab a little rest I guess you didn't know that you were dealing with the best '''''Casey Lee Williams''''':You shoulda stayed at home today This fisticuff won't go your way This confrontation isn't just for school It might be hard to hear me say Kicking your ass is child's play I hope you're not crushed by this ridicule '''''Jeff Williams''''':A slap on the wrist and a kick to the chin A hint of the flavor of steel '''''Sandy & Jeff''''':No one to blame it's the end of the game The humiliation is real '''''Sandy & Casey Lee''''':I'm the one '''''Sandy Casey''''':That was ripped from the earth and exposed to the sun '''''Sandy & Casey Lee''''':Overrun '''''Sandy Casey''''':By the hate and the beatings defiled by a father '''''Sandy & Casey Lee''''':I'm the one '''''Casey Lee Williams''''':I'll race with your eyes and you'll never outrun '''''Sandy & Casey Lee''''':Illusions '''''Casey Lee Williams''''':Will conquer your mind and will make you fulfill my design |translated= 欢迎抵达溺血浴缸，跳进来洗个澡吧 空手互搏，死亡竞赛开幕，加入这个俱乐部 踩下你的脸，钢镀的履轰轰发动 快放弃吧，挣扎抵抗并没卵用 我把你甩了老三圈，我都能上天了 我会让你痛的，我会让你叫的 还慢慢吞吞？那好，咱们来吧 我时间很紧，让好戏开演 我就是你妈跟你念叨的那个人 别去惹他，你作死吗 他们是游走方圆之外的物种 你好高哦，你好壮哦 不好意思大兄弟，还不够 决胜之战，你女票的包包也保不了你 他们越是庞大，流血越是不止 不痊愈的伤口越能深见骨头 面子败光的倒地，痛不欲生 感受一下败者的实感 我就是那个人 生于噩梦，杀手之子 手中没有枪 但我芒如刃光，坚比钢铁 我就是那个人 长于污秽，无人爱过 一切都是错觉 我会把你偷得眼珠子都没了，由身至心打趴你 还没倒下？好，下一回合 歌颂着痛苦之王，你会加冕的 你喜欢我的打扮？对，我就是很体面 它还会染上血迹，不过不是我流的 我躲进草丛时你只能乖乖战栗{{黑幕|@盖伦}} 我落地时看着你，你只能硬接碾压 立马折腰，苟延残喘 我猜对你在对付最强者一无所知 今天还是宅在家里 这场斗殴可不会顺你的心意 这次遭遇可不是学校的锻炼 这样说会让你难受 但踹你的菊花对我来说就像过家家 希望你别被这句嘲讽虐惨哦 拦腰一扫，直蹬下巴 嘴里渗着一丝丝铁味儿 怪不得谁，游戏结束了 屈辱才是真实 我就是那个人 从土中拔起，暴晒于炎日 疯长 某个父亲亵渎的憎恨和鞭笞把他驱动 我就是那个人 我让你目不暇接，你不能望其项背 诸般幻象 将征服你的心灵，履行我的旨意 }} {{RWBY}} == 外部链接 == [[分类:美国音乐作品]][[分类:RWBY音乐]][[分类:角色歌]] [[分类:插曲]] [[Category:角色歌]] {{替换侧边栏底图 |url=RWBY.jpg |width=100% }}
